title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section 897)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section 897) 

Order 2023. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 11 June 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited company act 2014 (section 897) order 2023 (2) order shall come operation 11 june 2023

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: In this Order—
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order— 

“Act of 2014” means the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014); 

“Regulations of 2015” means the Companies Act 2014 (Forms) Regulations 
2015 (S.I. No. 147 of 2015).
text_norm: 2 order-- act 2014 mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014) regulation 2015 mean company act 2014 (forms) regulation 2015 (s.i no 147 2015)

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: 3. The sole means to be used to deliver the following documents to the
text_raw:
3. The sole means to be used to deliver the following documents to the 
Registrar shall be those provided for under the Electronic Commerce Act (No. 
27 of 2000) effected in a manner which complies with any requirements of the 
Registrar of the kind referred to in sections 12(2)(b) and 13(2)(a) of that Act: 

(a) Form B77 which is prescribed under Regulation 5 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of sections 35(5) and 36(2) 
of the Act of 2014, 

(b) Form B5 which is prescribed under Regulation 10 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of section 70(7) and section 
1021(9) of the Act of 2014, 

(c) Form B7 which is prescribed under Regulation 3 of the 
Companies Act 2014 (Forms) (No. 2) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 
212 of 2015) for the purposes of section 83(6) of the Act of 2014, 

(d) 

a notice of certain alterations of share capital for the purposes of 
section 92(1) of the Act of 2014, 

(e) Form B4 which is prescribed under Regulation 14 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of section 93(3) of the Act 
of 2014, 

(f) Form B69 which is prescribed under Regulation 21 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of section 152(3) of the Act 
of 2014, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [293] 3 

(g) Form F12 which is prescribed under Regulation 59 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of section 1302(2) of the 
Act of 2014, 

(h) Form F2 which is prescribed under Regulation 60 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of paragraphs (a) and (b) of 
section 1302(3) and 1304(3) of the Act of 2014, 

(i) 

(j) 

Form F3 which is prescribed under Regulation 61 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of sections 1302(3)(c) and 
1304(3) of the Act of 2014, 

Form F14 which is prescribed under Regulation 63 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of paragraphs (e) and (f) of 
section 1302(3) and paragraphs (b) and (c) of section 1304(3) of 
the Act of 2014, 

(k) Form F7 which is prescribed under Regulation 64 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of section 1303(1) and 
1305(1) of the Act of 2014, and 

(l) 

Form F13 which is prescribed under Regulation 65 of the 
Regulations of 2015 for the purposes of section 1302 as applied 
by section 1304(1) of the Act of 2014. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 7 June 2023 

DARA CALLEARY, 

 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [293]

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to provide that the sole means to deliver the 
documents for the purposes of the Companies Act 2014 listed in Regulation 3 of 
this Order to the Registrar of Companies is by the means provided for under the 
Electronic Commerce Act 2000, effected in a manner which complies with any 
requirements of the Registrar of the kind referred to in sections 12(2)(b) and 
13(2)(a) of that Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [293] 5 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
